mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JR_DB.CONNECT_RECORD WHERE STR_TO_DATE(CONNECT_FULL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{start}, '%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONNECT_FULL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{end}, '%Y/%m/%d')
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, A.CONNECT_IP, A.CONNECT_DATE, A.CONNECT_OS, A.CONNECT_FULL_DATE FROM JR_DB.CONNECT_RECORD A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE CONNECT_DATE = #{today}

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, A.CONNECT_IP, A.CONNECT_DATE, A.CONNECT_OS, A.CONNECT_FULL_DATE FROM JR_DB.CONNECT_RECORD A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE STR_TO_DATE(CONNECT_FULL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{start}, '%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONNECT_FULL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{end}, '%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY A.CONNECT_FULL_DATE DESC
